## Next talk: Hannes Muhleisen
### Feb 24 @ 7pm EST
Using databases to wrangle and retrieve data from R and Python can be challenging, traditional systems like SQLite or MySQL are not built for analytical workloads and moving data into the analysis environment suffered from low bandwidth. DuckDB is a new in-process database management system that runs directly in-process, greatly streamlining setup and data transfer.
